name: Snowshovel
description:
Made for Mini Jame Gam #15

You play as a little guy who shovels up dynamically accumulating snow in a simple pixel art style.

I made this in two days after 8 hour long shifts. 

Made with Love(2d)

I tried to make this a web embed but couldn't get it to work :( Maybe I'll figure it out later.

Credits
bump.lua https://github.com/kikito/bump.lua
gradient library from https://love2d.org/wiki/Gradient
sounds from Zapsplat.com
music from pixabay.com (frequency of sleep meditation)
